title: Intro to Research Method
description: Introduction to methods used in conducting research on human behavior. Experimental research emphasized, but course covers other methods and some statistics.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PSYC 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 2028 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
